global_colors_info=”{}”]

BEGIN YOUR CAREER AT GMCI

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”70%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”52px||5px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato||||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”24px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

“Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.” —Confucius

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato||||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We want people who will be able to lead us, create and empower a team to deliver success and develop continuously. Yet we want candidates who can push themselves, self-starters with good leadership abilities and teamwork capabilities and an ability to create value for our customers. Below are few more ways that you can make a good start to your career at GMCI.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato||||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_6_font=”Lato|700|on||||||” header_6_text_align=”left” header_6_text_color=”#004b4f” header_6_font_size=”18px” header_6_letter_spacing=”0.5px” header_6_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”-4px||1px|||” custom_padding=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”20px|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_6_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_6_font_size_phone=”24px” header_6_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Reveal what you’re made of.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”7px||23px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We deliver a positive work atmosphere where everyone can realize their true talents. We work across a wide variety of sectors, locations and operations. This makes GMCI a relaxing and exciting place to work, mixing industry, minerals and technology challenges.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato||||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_6_font=”Lato|700|on||||||” header_6_text_align=”left” header_6_text_color=”#004b4f” header_6_font_size=”18px” header_6_letter_spacing=”0.5px” header_6_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”-4px||1px|||” custom_padding=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”20px|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_6_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_6_font_size_phone=”24px” header_6_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Embrace a world of opportunities

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”7px||29px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We are constantly creating new processes, goods and technology to have the best solutions and to better serve our customers.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato||||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_6_font=”Lato|700|on||||||” header_6_text_align=”left” header_6_text_color=”#004b4f” header_6_font_size=”18px” header_6_letter_spacing=”0.5px” header_6_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”-4px||1px|||” custom_padding=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”20px|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_6_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_6_font_size_phone=”24px” header_6_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Take a trip–wherever you are

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”7px||32px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

If you want to travel around the globe, then we’ll give you the chance to do that. Yet our business is so fast-moving that even if you remain in one spot, you can find lots of choice and chances to move ahead. You should be inspired to be looking for your own interests.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/begin-your-career.jpg” title_text=”begin your career” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”80%” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato||||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_6_font=”Lato|700|on||||||” header_6_text_align=”left” header_6_text_color=”#004b4f” header_6_font_size=”18px” header_6_letter_spacing=”0.5px” header_6_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”-4px||1px|||” custom_padding=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”20px|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_6_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_6_font_size_phone=”24px” header_6_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Make a difference and challenge yourself

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”7px||32px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

GMCI operates in a fast-moving market, and the willingness of our people to adapt and develop drives our success. Our system encourages individual ownership and accountability. We promote an ambitious mindset, ambition and measured risk-taking, and respect the outcomes. You can play a major role in our success right from the outset.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato||||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_6_font=”Lato|700|on||||||” header_6_text_align=”left” header_6_text_color=”#004b4f” header_6_font_size=”18px” header_6_letter_spacing=”0.5px” header_6_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”-4px||1px|||” custom_padding=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”20px|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_6_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_6_font_size_phone=”24px” header_6_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Be yourself–and succeed.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”7px|||||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We work all over the world, and our talent reflects that. If they’re leading the business or only joining, we’re looking for candidates from all walks of life because a diverse employee base provides unique perspectives on how to move forward.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”95%” max_width=”95%” custom_padding=”87px||45px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#004b4f” text_font_size=”60px” text_letter_spacing=”2px” text_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” width=”100%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”2px||0px||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”37px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

LEARN MORE

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row excerpt.rendered: BEGIN YOUR CAREER AT GMCI“Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.” —ConfuciusWe want people who will be able to lead us, create and empower a team to deliver success and develop continuously. Yet we want candidates who can push themselves, self-starters with good leadership abilities […]
